text: The men's 100 metre backstroke S7 event at the 2016 Paralympic Games took place on 8 September, at the Olympic Aquatics Stadium. Two heats were held, each with five swimmers. The swimmers with the eight fastest times advanced to the final. ==Records== , the existing World and Paralympic records were as follows. {| class="wikitable" |- |World record | |1:09.15 |Sheffield, Great Britain |27 July 2016 |- |Paralympic record | |1:09.86 |London, Great Britain |30 August 2012 |- |2016 World leading | |1:09.15 |Sheffield, Great Britain |27 July 2016 |} ==Heats== ===Heat 1=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
